All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Appointments
Appointments Model class that handles the logic and attributes of a given scheduled Appointment in the scheduler.
appointmentsController
FXML Controller class for the Appointments page of the Holladay Pediatric Scheduler.
AppointmentsDAO
Appointments DAO class that handles the SQL C.R.U.D logic for the given Appointments in the Scheduler's database.
Contacts
Contacts Model class that handles the logic and attributes of the contact a customer meets with at a scheduled appointment.
ContactsDAO
Contacts DAO class that handles the SQL C.R.U.D logic for the given Appointment contacts in the Scheduler's database.
Countries
Countries Model class that handles the logic and attributes of a given country in the scheduler.
CountriesDAO
Countries DAO class that handles the SQL C.R.U.D logic for the given Customer/User countries in the Scheduler's database.
CustomerReports
My scheduler reports Model class that handles the logic and attributes of my custom Customer by Country + Division report/TableView.
Customers
Customers Model class that handles the logic and attributes of a given Customer in the scheduler.
customersController
FXML Controller class for the Customer page of the Holladay Pediatric Scheduler.
CustomersDAO
Customers DAO class that handles the SQL C.R.U.D logic for the given Customers in the Scheduler's database.
DivisionsList
Util class that handles the Divisions list, and how the Customer Divisions ComboBox changes based on the Country selected.
FirstLevelDivisions
First-Level Divisions Model class that handles the logic and attributes of a given country's principal administrative division.
FirstLevelDivisionsDAO
First-Level Divisions DAO class that handles the SQL C.R.U.D logic for the given User Divisions in the Scheduler's database.
loginPageController
FXML Controller class for the Login page of the Holladay Pediatric Scheduler.
Main
The Holladay Pediatric Scheduler deals with Appointments, the Customers for those Appointments, and keeps track of reports for the two of them.
Main2
 
MonthOfAppointment
Appointment Month Reports Model class that handles the logic and attributes for the report(s) of a given appointment.
navigatorController
FXML Controller class for the navigator page of the Holladay Pediatric Scheduler.
reportsController
FXML Controller class for the Reports page of the Holladay Pediatric Scheduler.
ReportsDAO
My custom Reports DAO class that handles the SQL C.R.U.D logic for the Custom Reports in the Scheduler's database.
SchedulerDAO<T>
Interface for the Database DAO.
SchedulerDatabase
Database connector class that works in conjunction with the MySQL driver to open and close connections with the Scheduler Database.
TypeOfAppointment
Appointment Type Reports Model class that handles the logic and attributes for the report(s) of a given appointment.
Users
Users Model class that handles the logic and attributes of the scheduler user for the Login page.
UsersDAO
Users DAO class that handles the SQL C.R.U.D logic for the given Users in the Scheduler's database.
UTCConverter
Util class that converts the scheduler time to UTC Form.
